name: 王淑珍
objective: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體來設計積體電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路佈局的能力,課程內容包含：1.佈局與驗證 2.CMOS佈局的介紹3.電阻、電容的佈局介紹4.類比電路單元的佈局5.類比電路佈局的規劃6.電流鏡的佈局7.運算放大器的佈局
schedule:
Introduce layout tool
MOS structure
Basic circuits Layout
Design Rule Check(DRC)
Homework #1
Middle exam (4/16)
Resistance Layout
Capacitance Layout
Layout V.S schematic (LVS)
Homework #2
Current mirror layout
Operation amplifier layout
Homework #3
Final exam (6/18)
scorePolicy:
middle exam  30%
final  exam  30%
homework     30%
other        10%
